# What is this?

This site demonstrates how to use [gatsby-plugin-graphql-loader](https://github.com/NWRichmond/gatsby-plugin-graphql-loader), a Gatsby plugin which allows for queries to be loaded into React components from `.graphql` and `.gql` files.
